channel.title: Asteroid comet of the Day

item.title: Air Comet
item.description: Air Comet was an airline based in Madrid, Spain. It operated scheduled long-haul services from Madrid to 13 destinations in Central and South America, as well as services in Europe. Its main base was Terminal 1 at Madridâ€“Barajas Airport. The airline cooperated with airlines such as AeroSur through codeshare agreements.
